name: Filibuster (Next gen)
description:
Three years later the famous Filibusteris back! This time it has better graphics and can actually be played on mobile devices. It's a bit rusty around the edges but I can always fix that in three years...

If you land on the start page and don't know what to do - scroll down and you'll see the play button!

I've made this game on my journey to learning React - it's quite the step up from my basic quizzing app.
